item.title: Why Presence's Audience Score On Rotten Tomatoes Is So Much Lower Than The 88% Critics Score
item.description: While critics agree Steven Soderbergh's new movie Presence is great, audiences are not as impressed by the new horror film.

item.title: Sony Puts The Final Nail In The Coffin Of Their Spider-Man Universe By Removing An Untitled Marvel Movie From Their 2025 Release Slate
item.description: Sony's Spider-Man Universe officially doesn't have any upcoming movies as the studio cancels the last untitled film in its production slate.

item.title: James Bond's 10 Campest Movie Moments
item.description: Although the most recent James Bond movies have been dark and gritty, the 007 franchise has a long history of delightfully campy moments.
